title: Top / Middle / Jungle Plat + Pref
body:
I'm wanting a team that is consistent when it comes to playing regularly and everyone is always here for practice. So I have searched and no one can seem to do that so I'm making a consistent team that plays on a regular basis. To make sure its consistent, **I will get your number by the chance an emergency comes up, if u no call, no show, your off the team I only want people that ACTUALLY want to be on a team. **If you *read this whole thing, put rengar with your champs mastered along with ur actual champs.* so if you want a consistent late night team then here it is. 



times we will play(start time)
Saturday: 12 est
Monday: 11 est
Tuesday: 11 est
Thursday: 11 est
Wednesday 11 est:
Sunday: Discuss of this in our group chats/calls..

Application:
role:
age:
champs mastered:
what you will bring to the team:
strengths:
weaknesses:
why you want to join:
previous experience:
are you committed:
add A Tatertot

we play 2-5 hours a night

replies.body:
Application: 
role: Mid
age: 22
champs mastered: {{champion:103}}  {{champion:79}}  {{champion:34}}  {{champion:157}}  {{champion:4}}  {{champion:134}} 
what you will bring to the team: someone with knowledge of the mid lane
strengths: can adapt to agro/passive play, communication, personality
weaknesses: over extending, csing
why you want to join: looking for a commited team
previous experience: been on multiple ranked teams
are you committed: yes

Application:
role: TOp
age:19
champs mastered: rengar (not really), Singed, nasus, Irelia
what you will bring to the team: Good champion pool, know how to listen to calls, good team player, and can take criticism well.
strengths: Win lane most of the time, can listen / make calls, good communication
weaknesses: forget to ward at times, think im ahead when im not
why you want to join: ranked 5s are probably the most fun ive had playing this game and just want to be in it agian
previous experience: few smalls teams, nothing noteworthy.
are you committed: very!

Application:
Role: Jungle

Age:17

Champs Mastered: *Rengar* Warwick, Wukong, Maokai, Elise, Vi, J4, and Amumu

Age: 19 about to be 20 in a week or so

What I bring: Im a fairly diverse jungle.  I really like to pick into team comps, if they are late or early.  I normally can adapt.

Strengths:  I have a pretty good champ pool for jungle.  I love the new jungle,  actually better at it.  Very good at out smarting enemy jungle

Weaknesses:  I can get in stuck if i get caught behind when i am counter jungled heavily,  by the laners.  I normally need depend on my teammates to pull me out, if i get killed in my jungle early.

Why do i want to join:  My group that i play with now is starting to play less and less,  and i am starting to get better and better than them.  Want a real team.

Experience:  Played league for about a year and half. Now a platinum tier jungle,  had over 1000 ranked games this year.  Played on about 5 ranked teams that went to about silver then just broke up

Are you commited: Work about 20-30 hours a week,  other than that I probably play league for a good 50 hours a week haha.

Application:
Role: Midlane

Age: 17

Champs mastered: Zed, Syndra, LeBlanc

What you will bring to the team:  Lots of experience and the ability to make plays constantly

Strengths: Massive champion pool, great farming, dominant dueling/teamfighting, can play multiple playstyles.

Weaknesses:  Tend to play aggressive because i feel the need to carry often makes me tunnel vision.

Why you want to join: Love playing on 5's teams rather than frustrating soloq.

Previous experience: Played on multiple 5's teams, done multiple small tournaments, shotcalled, lots of experience

Are you committed: Can play 6+ hours a day on weekdays, and 10+ on weekends.
